import React, { useState } from 'react'; import SEO from '../components/SEO'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', business: '', service: '', message: '', website: '', }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const [isSubmitted, setIsSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); // Simulate form submission await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1500)); setIsSubmitting(false); setIsSubmitted(true); }; const contactInfo = [ { icon: ( ), label: 'Phone', value: '01225 123 456', href: 'tel:01225123456', description: 'Mon-Fri 9am-5pm', }, { icon: ( ), label: 'Email', value: 'hello@seokings.co.uk', href: 'mailto:hello@seokings.co.uk', description: 'We reply within 24 hours', }, { icon: ( ), label: 'Location', value: 'Bath, Somerset', href: null, description: 'Serving all of BANES', }, ]; const services = [ 'Website Design', 'Local SEO', 'Google Business Profile', 'Full Package (All Services)', 'Not sure yet', ]; return ( <> {/* Hero Section */}

))}
